contents:
I am Kazakh from XINJIANG (west east china).  
I know you guys know about the camps. 
And I wanna know more about outside world, and know what other things They did.  
I wanna say that they didn’t just suppress Uyghur people, they also suppressed Kazakh people. Basically every Muslims. Sadly, only few have spoke for Kazakh people.  
What they did is terrible and I believe there are still a lot of things we don’t know about.  
Hope for peace and free will.
